reviews.review: Лучшая игра на свете. Помню впервые когда нашел ее думал что лучше не будет. И ведь прав был :D
Gra jest fajna ponieważ trzeba trochę pomyśleć. Można stworzyć własny test i zagrać w niego samemu lub w dwie osoby.

I LOVE THIS GAME! It's one of my favourite games ever. Being able to make my own levels with the editor is one of the best parts.

I did find a glitch with it though (I think). When you create a test chamber you have a window, an exit and an entrance. It says that you cannot clone or delete them, but I can press C with the window selected to duplicate it. If I do that, I can't delete it again. But I don't mind, it looks nice with some of the chambers that I have made. (the glitch doesn't break anything, it just creates a second window)
ооооочень круто играть с другом, типа да

My favourite game of all time! Fantastic story with extremely fun game-play, puzzles, and especially the deep lore surrounding the entire Portal universe. The CO-OP is very fun and even comes with its own little story and just builds on what Portal and Portal 2 did. 10/10 would recommend for everyone to play!

1편보다 발전한 게임
부모 이기는 자식 있다

Really takes me back to the good ol' days of Portal 2 let's plays and playing this on my xbox. If you also have a history with this game, I would recommend you buy it just for the nostalgia, if not for the gameplay. If you don't, then you should still buy it as it has aged well and is fairly cheap in price for what it is. 10/10
Oyun çok güzel, ben beğendim. Bu kadar güzel grafikli bir oyunu 2009 yılında alınan bilgisayarımda oynuyorum. Hikâyesi de güzel, ben beğendim.

oyunun grafikleri güzel ama sorce 2 motoru sayesinde grafiklerine göre kötü bilgisayarlarda bile iyi fps alabilirsiniz.oynanış zor değil eğlenceli ve valve kalitesi bu oyunda da korunmuş.bir oyuncunun zekleri ve istekleri ne olursa olsun oynaması gereken bir şaeser.bir sanat.

I really like this game because all the puzzles are great and the story is very good. I think the idea of comunity test chambers is a very good idea. I havent played the co-op mode yet because none of my friends really play portal but the rest is really good
hoş oyun 8 saatte bitti oynayıp köşeye kaldırdım ben sizde öyle yapacaksınız muhtemelen ama iyi oyundur tavsiye ederim
Best speedrun game ever and replayable :D

About the best game i have EVER played.


Hoping for a portal three though.
This is a fun and intising game made for everyone
Portal 2 is such a classic puzzle game with an intricate plot line and interesting characters. A must play if you don't get motion sickness easily.
One of the a few games I enjoyed from Valve. I definitely recommend it.
I got this for my girlfriend, she loves it, great for any level gamer.
Played through the story and the multiplayer mode multiple times and still can't get enough. One of my favorite games of all time.
really good game overall very appealing to most ages and very fun to speedrun
i think the puzzles are challenging but doable and creative.  I like all the new elements and the story.
It has a cool story line on top of the puzzles that you play. The scenery and all the places you visit is also nice.

The gameplay is always something new and increasingly more challenging, and to top it off the dialogue is clever and funny, which come from a small cast of very likable characters. Overall one of my favourite games! If you like puzzles and sarcasm, pick this one up. You won't regret it.
Best game i have ever played
Excelente jogo de enigmas. Além de ser super leve pra maquinas mais fracas. Recomendo!

Meilleure jeux casse tête existant 
Dans le commentaire aider moi à en trouver d’autre
It's fun but there is a little bit of bad language. Apart from that a pretty good puzzle game.
One of the best games I ever played.
a really fun game to play and makes you really think about the things going on around you =D

El mejor juego y demasiado adictivo, tipo para cuando te cortan el internet o la luz te quedas unas buenas horas entretenido, me lo pase mas de 6 veces y sigo sin cansarme del juego B)

me gusto mucho, pero mucho, pero MUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUCHO este juego. Lo recomiendo infinitamente a las personas que le encantan los puzzles. lo unicó que fallo son las pantallas de carga que son largas, pero es un buen juego. Si quieres buscar cosas diferentes... Este juego es el ideal.

The game is extremely funny, voice acting is amazing, and the story while not complex is still intriguing none the less. The co-op mode is fun as well especially with a friend. The game is buggy at certain times however won't ruin enjoyment in addition to the gameplay being far less clunky than the first. I was able to breeze through the puzzles but that's most likely because I played the co-op mode first therefore i understood the physics and mechanics.
创意工坊才是灵魂，大佬们也太顶了
Отличная игра. Отличный сюжет. Отличный графон.
Aslında hikayesinin arkasında bir çok gizem barındırıyor nerdeyse her testte bir gizli alan var hatta bir bölümde half life a gönderme vardı borealis gemisi ile ilgili 10/7 lik oyun bence deneyin
I LOVED this game. It's really fun to play with my friend Nathan on here. I actually gifted this game to him.
What i learn from this game, your worst enemy can be your bestfriend and your bestfriend can be your worst enemy, Can wait from Portal 3 come out. Very like the story and Music XD LOVE IT !!!!
es de esos juegos en los que al menos tienes algo que hacer cuando acabas la campaña, asi que si vale tu dinero ;)
